descriptor.name: Claim Insurance Policy
descriptor.short_desc: Buyer can claim their insurance by visiting the below url

descriptor.name: Motor Policy Document
descriptor.short_desc: Download your digitally signed policy document here
descriptor.long_desc: Download you digitally signed policy document here. This document is password protected. To open this document, please type in your password in DDMMMYYYYXXXX format where DDMMMYYYY represents your date of birth, and XXXX represents the first four letters of your name
